8VIM RCs and nightlies

Repo for 8VIM RCs and nightlies versions

Currently it serves 2 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/8VIM/fdroid/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
62 C7 6C ED 86 93 8B 6F 6A 4C 0E 5F 69 92 EB 17 0A 76 74 87 32 51 71 D7 44 54 EC D9 24 C6 40 8D
